Question: Beijing Yunji Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Beijing Yunji Technology Co., Ltd.

Product Highlight: CES 2024

- Delivery robot “RUN”
- Interactive display robot “Sail”
- Intelligent chassis “Water”
- Intelligent new retail system “Aladdin”
- Used in hotels, office buildings, hospitals, government halls, and shopping malls
- Strategic partners include Huawei, INTEL, and other Fortune 100 companies
- Solutions have served 100+ million guests in 15,000+ hotels worldwide
- Robots used in 41 countries and regions
- Completed 10 rounds of financing
- Investors include Tencent, Lenovo Capital, Trip.com International, and others
Summary_cn:
北京云迹科技有限公司。

产品亮点：2024年国际消费电子展

- 智能送餐机器人“RUN”
- 互动展示机器人“Sail”
- 智能底盘“Water”
- 智慧新零售系统“阿拉丁”
- 应用于酒店、办公楼、医院、政府大厅和购物商场
- 战略合作伙伴包括华为、英特尔和其他财富100强公司
- 解决方案在全球超过15000家酒店为1亿多名客人提供服务
- 机器人在41个国家和地区使用
- 完成10轮融资
- 投资方包括腾讯、联想创投、携程国际等
